00033 #include <OSL/genclosure.h>
00034 #include <OSL/oslclosure.h>
00035 
00036 #include "osl_closures.h"
00037 #include "osl_shader.h"
00038 
00039 #include "util_debug.h"
00040 #include "util_param.h"
00041 
00042 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00043 
00044 static void generic_closure_setup(OSL::RendererServices *, int id, void *data)
00045 {
00046     assert(data);
00047     OSL::ClosurePrimitive *prim = (OSL::ClosurePrimitive *)data;
00048     prim->setup();
00049 }
00050 
00051 static bool generic_closure_mergeable(int id, const void *dataA, const void *dataB)
00052 {
00053     assert(dataA && dataB);
00054 
00055     OSL::ClosurePrimitive *primA = (OSL::ClosurePrimitive *)dataA;
00056     OSL::ClosurePrimitive *primB = (OSL::ClosurePrimitive *)dataB;
00057     return primA->mergeable(primB);
00058 }
00059 
00060 static void register_closure(OSL::ShadingSystem *ss, const char *name, int id, OSL::ClosureParam *params, OSL::PrepareClosureFunc prepare)
00061 {
00062     int j;
00063     for(j = 0; params[j].type != TypeDesc(); ++j) {}
00064     int size = params[j].offset;
00065 
00066     ss->register_closure(name, id, params, size, prepare, generic_closure_setup, generic_closure_mergeable);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void OSLShader::register_closures(OSL::ShadingSystem *ss)
00070 {
00071     register_closure(ss, "diffuse", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_DIFFUSE_ID, bsdf_diffuse_params, bsdf_diffuse_prepare);
00072     register_closure(ss, "oren_nayar", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_OREN_NAYAR_ID, bsdf_oren_nayar_params, bsdf_oren_nayar_prepare);
00073     register_closure(ss, "translucent", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_TRANSLUCENT_ID, bsdf_translucent_params, bsdf_translucent_prepare);
00074     register_closure(ss, "reflection", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_REFLECTION_ID, bsdf_reflection_params, bsdf_reflection_prepare);
00075     register_closure(ss, "refraction", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_REFRACTION_ID, bsdf_refraction_params, bsdf_refraction_prepare);
00076     register_closure(ss, "transparent", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_TRANSPARENT_ID, bsdf_transparent_params, bsdf_transparent_prepare);
00077     register_closure(ss, "microfacet_ggx", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_GGX_ID, bsdf_microfacet_ggx_params, bsdf_microfacet_ggx_prepare);
00078     register_closure(ss, "microfacet_ggx_refraction", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_GGX_REFRACTION_ID, bsdf_microfacet_ggx_refraction_params, bsdf_microfacet_ggx_refraction_prepare);
00079     register_closure(ss, "microfacet_beckmann", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_BECKMANN_ID, bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_params, bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_prepare);
00080     register_closure(ss, "microfacet_beckmann_refraction", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_MICROFACET_BECKMANN_REFRACTION_ID, bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_refraction_params, bsdf_microfacet_beckmann_refraction_prepare);
00081     register_closure(ss, "ward", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_WARD_ID, bsdf_ward_params, bsdf_ward_prepare);
00082     register_closure(ss, "ashikhmin_velvet", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_ASHIKHMIN_VELVET_ID, bsdf_ashikhmin_velvet_params, bsdf_ashikhmin_velvet_prepare);
00083     register_closure(ss, "westin_backscatter", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_WESTIN_BACKSCATTER_ID, bsdf_westin_backscatter_params, bsdf_westin_backscatter_prepare);
00084     register_closure(ss, "westin_sheen", OSL_CLOSURE_BSDF_WESTIN_SHEEN_ID, bsdf_westin_sheen_params, bsdf_westin_sheen_prepare);
00085     register_closure(ss, "bssrdf_cubic", OSL_CLOSURE_BSSRDF_CUBIC_ID, closure_bssrdf_cubic_params, closure_bssrdf_cubic_prepare);
00086     register_closure(ss, "emission", OSL_CLOSURE_EMISSION_ID, closure_emission_params, closure_emission_prepare);
00087     register_closure(ss, "debug", OSL_CLOSURE_DEBUG_ID, closure_debug_params, closure_debug_prepare);
00088     register_closure(ss, "background", OSL_CLOSURE_BACKGROUND_ID, closure_background_params, closure_background_prepare);
00089     register_closure(ss, "holdout", OSL_CLOSURE_HOLDOUT_ID, closure_holdout_params, closure_holdout_prepare);
00090     register_closure(ss, "subsurface", OSL_CLOSURE_SUBSURFACE_ID, closure_subsurface_params, closure_subsurface_prepare);
00091 }
